verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) Out of the depths <WH4615> I have cried <WH7121> to Thee, O Lord. <WH3068>
Lord, <WH136> hear <WH8085> my voice! <WH6963> Let Thine ears <WH241> be attentive <WH9533> To the voice <WH6963> of my supplications. <WH8469>
If <WH518> Thou, Lord, <WH3050> shouldst mark <WH8104> iniquities, <WH5771> O Lord, <WH136> who <WH4310> could stand <WH5975>?
But there is forgiveness <WH5547> with Thee, That Thou mayest be feared. <WH3372>
I wait <WH6960> for the Lord, <WH3068> my soul <WH5315> does wait, <WH6960> And in His word <WH1697> do I hope. <WH3176>
My soul <WH5315> [waits] for the Lord <WH136> More <WH4480> than <WH4480> the watchmen <WH8104> for the morning; <WH1242> [Indeed, more than] the watchmen <WH8104> for the morning. <WH1242>
O Israel, <WH3478> hope <WH3176> in the Lord; <WH3068> For with the Lord <WH3068> there is lovingkindness, <WH2617> And with Him is abundant <WH7235> redemption. <WH6304>
And He will redeem <WH6299> Israel <WH3478> From all <WH3605> his iniquities. <WH5771>
